name: Sailor Bandanna
description: Bandanna favored by sailors. You can't help but feel the romance of the sea with it.

name: Deckhand's Mop
description: A tool used to clean the deck. When used with a deck brush, it keeps the deck shiny.

name: Sailors' Old Compass
description: Compass used for a long time. There are some noticeable damage, but there should be no problem with its accuracy.

name: Spare Sail Arrangement Set
description: Tool to arrange spare sails. By keeping good track of it it'll be helpful for when in a pinch.

name: Dampier's Diary
description: Diary of a voyager who sailed around the world 3 times. It also describes the foods served during the travels.

special_effect.name: Catering Master
special_effect.description: When a food item is used, there will be a chance not to consume it.

name: Sailors' Goddess Charm
description: A charm with the protection from the ancient sea goddess. Will calm down the Crew.

name: Sailors' Ancient Art of Surveying
description: A document on old surveying techniques used when building structures.

name: Distress Signal Dictionary
description: Dictionary with summary of distress signals of each nation. Compiled with the hope of helping voyagers even outside their national borders.

special_effect.name: Search & Rescue
special_effect.description: Receives distress signals from NPCs while sailing.

name: Sailors' Large Torch
description: A large torch. The flame is easy to see even from a distance. Helps Sailors do their work.

special_effect.name: Stormy Sailing
special_effect.description: In the event of a storm or snowstorm the max speed increases and the Ship will be able to sail normally. Also the Ship won't stop during Auto Navigation.

name: Quartermaster's Earplugs
description: Earplugs used to block out ambient sounds and enable Sailors to concentrate on steering operations. It cannot block out the sound of intense bombardment.

special_effect.name: Turning Technique
special_effect.description: Difficulty in turning while using Emergency Acceleration during non-battle is reduced.

name: Wooden Shovel
description: An inexpensive wooden shovel. Light and easy to handle, but be careful not to get it too close to the open fire.

special_effect.name: Add Fuel
special_effect.description: Consume coal fuel to enhance the effectiveness of the steam engine. This doesn't apply to Combined Ships.

name: Sail Handlers' Gloves
description: Gloves favored by sail handlers. Non-slip material is used to make the rope easier to handle.

name: Quartermaster's Earmuffs
description: Earmuffs used to block out ambient sounds and enable Sailors to concentrate on steering operations. Also provides protection against the cold.

special_effect.name: Turning Technique
special_effect.description: Difficulty in turning while using Emergency Acceleration during non-battle is reduced.

name: Bronze Shovel
description: Bronze shovel used to carry coal fuel. If Sailors aren't careful enough, the handle might burn.

special_effect.name: Add Fuel
special_effect.description: Consume coal fuel to enhance the effectiveness of the steam engine. This doesn't apply to Combined Ships.

name: Iron Shovel
description: Iron shovel for transporting coal fuel. It's made with a sturdy material, making it easy to transport fuel.

special_effect.name: Add Fuel
special_effect.description: Consume coal fuel to enhance the effectiveness of the steam engine. This doesn't apply to Combined Ships.

name: Sailors' Small Torch
description: A small torch. Even though it's small, its bright light will help sailors.

special_effect.name: Stormy Sailing
special_effect.description: In the event of a storm or snowstorm the max speed increases and the Ship will be able to sail normally. Also the Ship won't stop during Auto Navigation.

name: Small Wooden Shovel
description: A small wooden shovel. Sailors will need to make more trips since the amount this shovel carries is small.

special_effect.name: Add Fuel
special_effect.description: Consume coal fuel to enhance the effectiveness of the steam engine. This doesn't apply to Combined Ships.

name: Fresh Water Instrument
description: An instrument to make drinking water. Comes with a powder that makes distilled water easier to drink.

special_effect.name: Distillation
special_effect.description: The amount of water obtained through Procurement increasesand you can use this even without rain.

name: Advanced Distress Signal Dictionary
description: Advanced dictionary with summary of distress signals of each nation. Compiled with the hope of helping voyagers even outside their national borders.

special_effect.name: Search & Rescue
special_effect.description: Receives distress signals from NPCs while sailing.

name: Sailors' Greater Torch
description: A massive torch. The flame is easy to see even from a distance. Helps Sailors do their work.

special_effect.name: Stormy Sailing
special_effect.description: In the event of a storm or snowstorm the max speed increases and the Ship will be able to sail normally. Also the Ship won't stop during Auto Navigation.

name: Advanced Distress Signal Dictionary
description: Advanced dictionary with summary of distress signals of each nation. Compiled with the hope of helping voyagers even outside their national borders.

special_effect.name: Search & Rescue
special_effect.description: Receives distress signals from NPCs while sailing.

name: Storage Man's Rigging
description: A rigging used for storing a lot of cargo. Made from steel.

name: Storage Man's Inspection Book
description: A notebook with important contents on facility inspection. It's easy to understand with illustrations.

name: Oak Wine Barrel
description: Useful barrel to not just store alcohol, but also to maintain ship balance being placed under cargo.

name: Storage Man's Techniques Book
description: Document with information on loading and unloading objects.

name: Sailors' Money Charm
description: A lucky charm made from ancient money. Will calm down the crew.

name: Simple Sailors' Calculating Tool
description: A simple tool for calculating cargo amounts. Can be easily used by Sailors.

name: Secrets of Craft
description: A book written about secrets of craft making. It shows how to learn the basics and become a master.

special_effect.name: Special Goods Production
special_effect.description: Special Goods made through Sewing, Casting or Handicrafts on the sea will be more likely to be high-performing. After Special Goods Production, the Durability of the Sailor Equipment will decrease.

name: Physics Research Note
description: A study note from one physicist. It looks like their subject of study was on the relationship between loading method and propulsion power.

special_effect.name: Loading Technology
special_effect.description: Reduces the speed decrease from the loading weight of your Cargo.

name: Camouflage Guide
description: A book written about methods of deceiving people's eyes. It's rumored that it was written by a well-known magician.

special_effect.name: Camouflage (Hold)
special_effect.description: Makes it easier for enemies to plunder a fake Hold.

name: Fancy Perfume for Sailors
description: Refreshing lime scent that will suit a chic man of the sea. Knowledge on fragrances can also be utilized in cooking.

special_effect.name: Herbalism
special_effect.description: When using Food Items on the sea, its effects are increased and resolve Plague, Insomnia, Anxiety, and Quarrelling.

name: Sailors' Wooden Goddess Figurine
description: A simple wooden statue of a goddess. Sailors find a home in it while it watches over their work on the sea.

special_effect.name: Goddess' Protection
special_effect.description: Receive more protection against disasters from the Figurehead.

name: Sailors' Bronze Goddess Figurine
description: A bronze statue of a goddess. Daily care is essential to maintain its beauty.

special_effect.name: Goddess' Protection
special_effect.description: Receive more protection against disasters from the Figurehead.

name: Sailors' Star Charm
description: A starry charm. For some reason, just holding it heightens the creative urge.

special_effect.name: Special Goods Production
special_effect.description: Special Goods made through Sewing, Casting or Handicrafts on the sea will be more likely to be high-performing. After Special Goods Production, the Durability of the Sailor Equipment will decrease.

name: Research Thesis on Physics
description: One physicist's research thesis that describes large number of experimental results obtained with the help of voyagers.

special_effect.name: Loading Technology
special_effect.description: Reduces the speed decrease from the loading weight of your Cargo.

name: Transporters' Wisdom
description: A book written about the wisdom of transporters. It contains knowledge of how to perform loading and unloading more efficiently.

name: Token of Distant Sea Trading
description: A token that honors traders who have engaged in distant trade for a long period of time. It represents wisdom in regard to loading.

special_effect.name: Loading Technology
special_effect.description: Reduces the speed decrease from the loading weight of your Cargo.

name: Small Physics Research Note
description: A student's research note. The content is good, but the scribbled handwriting is hard to read.

special_effect.name: Loading Technology
special_effect.description: Reduces the speed decrease from the loading weight of your Cargo.

name: Sailors' Basics on Production Assistance
description: Book explaining how a Sailor can prepare themselves to be an Aide. Written about production techniques.

name: Naumachia Battle Tunic
description: Equipment that's reminiscent of fighters from staged naval battles in ancient Coliseums. Increases the crew's morale.

name: Naumachia Battle Pilum
description: Weapon that's reminiscent of fighters from staged naval battles in ancient coliseums. Increases the crew's morale.

name: Naumachia Master Laurel
description: A replica of the laurel that commended the winner of the staged naval battle in ancient coliseums.

name: Sailor's Gloves
description: Sturdy gloves to help sailors on their jobs. They're made from linens.

name: Heavy Cannon-shot
description: Cannon-shot with highly increased weight. Because of its weight, carrying it is a job for novice sailors.

special_effect.name: Gun Carriage Shock
special_effect.description: Makes it less likely for enemy shots to hit your ship at a certain rate, the further away you are from the center of their firing range. Your firing accuracy to faraway ships also decreases.

name: Sterncastle Reinforcing Iron
description: Iron used to reinforce the sterncastle. Very sturdy but once damaged it takes time to be repaired.

special_effect.name: Heavy Iron Sterncastle
special_effect.description: Reduce damage received on Stern, but this effect will be disabled and the repair effect will be reduced until the Durability of the Ship is fully recovered.

name: Shooting Training Record
description: A memo that records the shooting training content. The amount of training accumulated every day leads toconfidence in actual battles.

special_effect.name: Intuitive Shooting
special_effect.description: The effects of the Gunfire Skill will increase but damage received will increase as well if it fails. While using a Gun or a Bow, the counter effect of both sides will increase.

name: Rudder Makers' Saw
description: A saw favored by rudder makers. Well-fitted in the hand of a user, it can fix rudders instantly.

special_effect.name: Repair Artisan (Rudder)
special_effect.description: Automatically repairs damaged rudders during sea battles. Once it repairs the complete damage of the rudder, the effect becomes disabled.

name: Sailmakers' Sewing Set
description: A sewing set favored by sailmakers. Well-fitted in the hand of a user, it can fix sails instantly.

special_effect.name: Repair Artisan (Sail)
special_effect.description: Automatically repairs damaged sails during sea battles. Once it repairs the complete damage of the sail, the effect becomes disabled.

name: Book of Lifesaving Healing
description: A book about advanced lifesaving treatments. One can learn how to save the life of someone who got seriously injured.

special_effect.name: Resuscitation
special_effect.description: Recovers the Sailors' maximum recovery limit at regular time intervals if it's been decreased.

name: Silver Scalpel
description: An expensive surgery tool. It is extremely sharp and won't cut the patient more than necessary.

special_effect.name: Emergency Cure
special_effect.description: Automatically uses the Surgery Skill at a certain rate to recover your Sailors during a Melee Battle.

name: Counterattack Flag
description: A flag used as a sign for counterattacks. It increases the morale of sailors to not give up even if losing.

special_effect.name: Retaliate
special_effect.description: Makes it possible to make an immediate counterattack when evading a Melee Battle, with a certain rate to become a Critical Attack, except during PvP battles.

name: Phalanx Shield
description: A shield used by Ancient Greek heavy infantries. It's suited for defense-focused fighting.

special_effect.name: Prepare to Guard
special_effect.description: Reduces damage to Durability and makes it easier to withdraw from Melee Battles, but the Attack Powers of Cannon Attacks and Melee Battles decrease.

name: Improved Grapeshot
description: Cannon-shot with even more round shots. Drives a stronger fear to the enemy sailors' hearts.

special_effect.name: Explosive Loading
special_effect.description: Increases the rate for a Great Disorder. Disordered enemy Sailors may engage in Melee Battles to nearby enemy ships.

name: Improved Incendiary Shot
description: Cannon-shot with even more gunpowder in it. It is very flammable.

special_effect.name: Combustion
special_effect.description: Increases the chance to weaken the value of Armour.

name: Improved Double Shot
description: Cannon-shot with more weight. The two cannonballs that are fired severely impact the enemy ships.

special_effect.name: Armour Piercing
special_effect.description: Impact changes the direction of enemy ships at a certain rate when a shot hits them on the side.

name: Improved Smoke Shells
description: Cannon-shot with increased concentration of the smokescreen. Restricts the movements of those inside the blinding smokescreen.

special_effect.name: Concentrated Smokescreen
special_effect.description: Temporarily lowers enemy ship's Loading Speed.

name: Infiltration Technical Book
description: A book about infiltration techniques. There's a disclaimer in the opening to hide the identity of the author.

special_effect.name: Sabotage Tactics
special_effect.description: Increases the efficiency of Demolition Work at a certain rate. Also, loots Water and Timber during Sabotage.

name: Giant Gunpowder Bag
description: A giant bag stuffed with large amount of gunpowder. There's more than enough to create a large explosion in it.

name: High Precision Protractor
description: A protractor used to calculate angles for effective cannon shots. Although precise, it's easily affected by the ship's movement.

special_effect.name: Intensive Shelling
special_effect.description: Cannon power decreases while moving, but Range, Hit Probability and the cannon power of non-Critical Hits will be improved while not moving.

name: High Magnification Telescope
description: A telescope that helps you see afar very well. The only downside is that it's harder to see close objects.

special_effect.name: Long Range Cannon Fire
special_effect.description: Cannon power and Hit Probability to enemy ships that are far will improve, but these effects become weaker when the enemy ships are closer.

name: Refined Ram Blueprint
description: A blueprint illustrating the construction for a refined ram. It describes a way to more efficiently collide into enemy ships.

special_effect.name: Refined Ram
special_effect.description: Collides your Ram into enemy ships and shake off their Sailors.

name: Sailors' Victory Ribbon
description: A special ribbon used as a mark of the winner. Sailors' morale will rise and they will join forces to fight together.

special_effect.name: Coordinated Salvo
special_effect.description: Able to fire more cannons even when the number of Sailors is fewer.

name: Baton of Command Center's Officers
description: A baton used by officers belonging to the Command Center. More accurate instructions regarding ship handling can be given to Sailors.

name: Pirate King's Coin
description: A gold coin plundered by Henry Every in India. It's made of pure gold with Sanskrit engraved on it. It's considered to be made in ancient times.

special_effect.name: Deadly Combat
special_effect.description: The effects of the Guard, Assault and Tactics Skills will increase but damage received will increase as well if it fails.

name: Tosenkyo
description: The oldest strategy book in Japan written by the Oe clan, a noble family of Kyoto. Later, it was handed down to the Mohri clan, a descendant of the Oe clan.

special_effect.name: Sengoku Art of Warfare
special_effect.description: The Fire and Disorder caused to the enemy Ship sandwiched between your Ship and your ally Ship cannot be resolved for a certain period of time with a certain probability.

name: Monomakh's Cap
description: A crown that has been passed down for generations by the emperors of Russia. It's made of warm fur and represents the prestige of the Russian Empire.

special_effect.name: Winter General
special_effect.description: Reduce Water and Munitions on an enemy ship during Melee Battle. If a Fire breaks out on either your Ship or an enemy ship, the damage your ship receives during Melee Battle will increase.

name: Prince of Yanping's Strategy Book
description: A book summarizing the art of warfare invented by Koxinga. The knowledge of battles of endurance at sea can be gained.

special_effect.name: Reorganization of Force
special_effect.description: During Melee Battle, if you are inferior after a certain number of turns, the Retreat success rate will increase and the number of Sailors will be recovered after successful Retreat.

name: Wooden Horse Blueprint
description: A blueprint of a wooden horse used in a strategy concocted by a general in a great war in ancient Greece.

special_effect.name: The Trojan Horse
special_effect.description: During Melee Battle, your Sailors board an enemy ship and sabotage their Repair and Surgery operations after your Ship makes a Retreat. Once the sabotage has been completed, the Sailors will jump into the sea.

name: Requerimiento
description: A declaration letter authorizing the conquest of the New World. It was given to the Conquistadors by the king of Spain.

special_effect.name: Conquistador
special_effect.description: After Melee Battle, the capabilities of the side that successfully made a Retreat first will be reduced in the next Melee Battle. The earlier the Retreat, the greater the effect.

name: Work Handbook for Novices
description: A handbook summarizing the daily work to be done for novice Sailors. It's an essential item until they become independent.

special_effect.name: Repetitive Operations
special_effect.description: Skills will continue to be activated during Sea Battles. This doesn't include Item/Equipment effects.

name: Maintenance Tool Set
description: A tool set used for maintenance of Ship Parts. If it's a slight scratch, it can be repaired in a blink of an eye.

special_effect.name: Instant Maintenance
special_effect.description: Damage to Ship Parts will be prevented during Sea Battles with a certain probability. This Skill is cumulative.

name: Wave Monitoring Buoy
description: A device that can monitor the direction of waves by floating it on the sea. Anyone can handle it, but it will be a little difficult to recover it after use.

special_effect.name: Naval Battle Map (Waves)
special_effect.description: During Sea Battles, the directions of the waves are displayed on the Naval Battle Map. The effect can be shared within the Fleet.

name: Small Weathervane
description: A small weathervane that can be carried around easily. Not only does it show the wind, but it also is used to soothe those watching it.

special_effect.name: Naval Battle Map (Wind)
special_effect.description: During Sea Battles, the directions of the wind are displayed on the Naval Battle Map. The effect can be shared within the Fleet.

name: Small Telescope
description: Lightweight and portable telescope. The accuracy is not very good, but you can observe the surroundings widely.

special_effect.name: Naval Battle Map (Ships)
special_effect.description: During Sea Battles, the directions of the Ships are displayed on the Naval Battle Map. The effect can be shared within the Fleet.

name: Speaking Tube
description: A simple communication device. A sailor installed it on the ship without permission, but it was useful, so he was never blamed.

special_effect.name: Naval Battle Map (Aiming)
special_effect.description: During Sea Battles, Enemy Ships taking aim at your Ship blink on and off on the Naval Battle Map. The effect can be shared within the Fleet.

name: Basic Group Tactic
description: A book that describes the basic tactics of battles between fleets. It repeatedly emphasizes the importance of the survival of flagships.

special_effect.name: Flagship's Spirit
special_effect.description: Damage to the Flagship decreases depending on the number of allies around, and increases depending on the number of incapacitated allies during the battle. The effects only increase slightly even when equipped by multiple players.

name: Shell Hammer
description: A hammer for crafting shells. Be careful not to shake the ship during work as it requires delicate processing.

special_effect.name: Retreat Block
special_effect.description: Capable of launching cannon attacks against enemy ships, with a certain probability of preventing their retreat. Can be activated by halting your ship for a specific period. Not available to be used by high-Notoriety Pirate characters.

name: Attack Nobori Flag
description: The nobori flag raised by those who boldly jump into the center of the battlefield. It's up to you to be brave or reckless.

special_effect.name: Frontal Breakthrough
special_effect.description: The effect of the Evasion Skill increases against cannon attacks dealt by Enemy Ships that are closer to the outer circle of the Battle Area than your Ship.

name: Steel Wire Rope
description: A very durable rope woven with steel thread. You can wipe out the surrounding mines by submerging it on the seabed and pulling it by ship.

special_effect.name: Minesweeping
special_effect.description: The effective range of Sea Mine Removal increases, but the Ship Speed reduces.

name: Reinforced Elm Lumber
description: Elm lumber for Ship reinforcement. Sailors who wanted to keep their ships from scratching had it made.

name: Presterilized Bandage
description: Bandage stored in a clean state. Used to stop bleeding in emergencies.

special_effect.name: Emergency Cure
special_effect.description: Automatically uses the Surgery Skill at a certain rate to recover your Sailors during a Melee Battle.

name: Bugle
description: Bugle that signals a counterattack, which boosts the morale of the sailors.

special_effect.name: Retaliate
special_effect.description: Makes it possible to make an immediate counterattack when evading a Melee Battle, with a certain rate to become a Critical Attack, except during PvP battles.

name: Ngumi Shield
description: A shield used by Nguni soldiers. With technique that developed as it was passed down, it has a strong defense.

special_effect.name: Prepare to Guard
special_effect.description: Reduces damage to Durability and makes it easier to withdraw from Melee Battles, but the Attack Powers of Cannon Attacks and Melee Battles decrease.

name: Master's Improved Grapeshot
description: Grapeshots further improved by a master. Disperses even more round shots.

special_effect.name: Explosive Loading
special_effect.description: Increases the rate for a Great Disorder. Disordered enemy Sailors may engage in Melee Battles to nearby enemy ships.

name: Master's Improved Smoke Shells
description: Smoke shell further improved by a master. Covers enemy ships in thicker smoke.

special_effect.name: Concentrated Smokescreen
special_effect.description: Temporarily lowers enemy ship's Loading Speed.

name: Infiltration Disguise Set
description: A disguise set to use when infiltrating. It includes the essentials like glasses and a false beard.

special_effect.name: Sabotage Tactics
special_effect.description: Increases the efficiency of Demolition Work at a certain rate. Also, loots Water and Timber during Sabotage.

name: Full Gunpowder Bag
description: Bag filled to the brim with gunpowder. Must be handled with care.

special_effect.name: Large Secret Blast
special_effect.description: Blasts the enemy ship's Timber hold as well as munitions during Melee Battles and causes fire.

name: Cannon Sight
description: A sighting device used to calculate angles for effective and accurate cannon fire.

special_effect.name: Intensive Shelling
special_effect.description: Cannon power decreases while moving, but Range, Hit Probability and the cannon power of non-Critical Hits will be improved while not moving.

name: Vintage of The Blessing
description: A tasty alcohol treated to the crew on special occasions. By drinking this together, the bond is strengthened.

special_effect.name: Coordinated Salvo
special_effect.description: Able to fire more cannons even when the number of Sailors is fewer.

name: Rewards for Sailors
description: Rewards given to Sailors. The abilities of Sailors will be greatly drawn out.

special_effect.name: Coordinated Salvo
special_effect.description: Able to fire more cannons even when the number of Sailors is fewer.

name: Kohinur Diamond
description: World's largest diamond. It has been in many hands as if selecting its owner.

special_effect.name: Deadly Combat
special_effect.description: The effects of the Guard, Assault and Tactics Skills will increase but damage received will increase as well if it fails.

name: Average Sailors' Work Notes
description: A memo written by average Sailors on their tasks. It even shows how to work more efficiently.

special_effect.name: Repetitive Operations
special_effect.description: Skills will continue to be activated during Sea Battles. This doesn't include Item/Equipment effects.

name: Cursed Magic Horn
description: A cursed horn of great dread. When played, it turns the enemy into stone, rendering retreat impossible.

special_effect.name: Retreat Block
special_effect.description: Capable of launching cannon attacks against enemy ships, with a certain probability of preventing their retreat. Can be activated by halting your ship for a specific period. Not available to be used by high-Notoriety Pirate characters.

name: Small Heavy Cannon-shot
description: Small cannon-shot with increased weight. Those who transport it are often discouraged when realizing it's heavier than it looks.

special_effect.name: Gun Carriage Shock
special_effect.description: Makes it less likely for enemy shots to hit your ship at a certain rate, the further away you are from the center of their firing range. Your firing accuracy to faraway ships also decreases.

name: Small Improved Grapeshot
description: Small cannon-shot with increased round shots. Enemies will be bewildered by how full it is.

special_effect.name: Explosive Loading
special_effect.description: Increases the rate for a Great Disorder. Disordered enemy Sailors may engage in Melee Battles to nearby enemy ships.

name: Small Improved Incendiary Shot
description: Small cannon-shot with more gunpowder. It may be small, but is still very flammable.

special_effect.name: Combustion
special_effect.description: Increases the chance to weaken the value of Armour.

name: Small Improved Double Shot
description: Small cannon shot with increased weight. Enemies who let their guard down after seeing the size will be shocked by how dangerous it is.

special_effect.name: Armour Piercing
special_effect.description: Impact changes the direction of enemy ships at a certain rate when a shot hits them on the side.

name: Small Improved Smoke Shells
description: Small cannon-shot that produces thicker smokescreen. Aim well before firing and it will have good effect.

special_effect.name: Concentrated Smokescreen
special_effect.description: Temporarily lowers enemy ship's Loading Speed.

name: Short Book of Lifesaving Healing
description: A short book on advanced lifesaving treatments. There is not much writing but its contents are accurate.

special_effect.name: Resuscitation
special_effect.description: Recovers the Sailors' maximum recovery limit at regular time intervals if it's been decreased.

name: Small Gunpowder Bag
description: A small bag filled to the brim with gunpowder. You should plan well to use it effectively.

special_effect.name: Large Secret Blast
special_effect.description: Blasts the enemy ship's Timber hold as well as munitions during Melee Battles and causes fire.

name: Rough Refined Ram Blueprint
description: A rough blueprint on the structure of a Refined Ram. It could be used to come up with battle tactics using a ram.

special_effect.name: Refined Ram
special_effect.description: Collides your Ram into enemy ships and shake off their Sailors.

name: Short Infiltration Technical Book
description: A simple book written about infiltration techniques. It has no detail on how to escape after infiltrating.

special_effect.name: Sabotage Tactics
special_effect.description: Increases the efficiency of Demolition Work at a certain rate. Also, loots Water and Timber during Sabotage.

name: One Delectable Puff
description: Highest grade of tobacco enjoyed by Baccanian pirates. Tastes best when smoking alongside your plunder.

special_effect.name: Commandeer
special_effect.description: When the number of Sailors decreases during Melee Battle, your Melee Battle strength doesn't decrease as much but your Sailor's maximum recovery may decrease.

name: Sultan's Authorization
description: An imperial rescript by the Ottoman sultan authorizing Hayreddin's control of the empire's navy.

special_effect.name: Barbarossa's Naval Tactic
special_effect.description: When your ship's Durability is below a certain amount, your cannon's accuracy and evasion abilities increase.

name: Common Sense
description: A pamphlet written by Thomas Paine. It criticizes England's control and advocated for the independence of North America.

special_effect.name: Automatic Mechanism
special_effect.description: When Gatling Gun or Flamethrower is available to use in an attack, they are automatically fired during Melee Battle.

name: Aides' Guide (Nml.Shot Def.)
description: A guide to the mindset needed to become an Aide, including information on ship defence against damage from Normal Shots.

special_effect.name: Aide Sup.(Nml Shot Def)
special_effect.description: Increases the effects of the following Aide Skills: Normal Shot Defence and Double-Shot Defence.

name: Aides' Guide (Sp.Shell Def.)
description: Book explaining how a Sailor can prepare themselves to be an Aide. Written about ship damage from special shells.

name: Gyoyomon Rosary
description: Rosary of Otomo clan's emblem, the apricot leaf.

special_effect.name: Commandeer
special_effect.description: When the number of Sailors decreases during Melee Battle, your Melee Battle strength doesn't decrease as much but your Sailor's maximum recovery may decrease.

name: Official Seal of Tang and Silla
description: A seal said to be used by Jang Bogo, who had an official rank in both the Tang Empire and the Silla Kingdom.

special_effect.name: Barbarossa's Naval Tactic
special_effect.description: When your ship's Durability is below a certain amount, your cannon's accuracy and evasion abilities increase.

name: Black Bart's Pirate Code
description: Code of conducts that Bartholomew Roberts enforced on his crew. Although strict, it is mostly democratic.

special_effect.name: Automatic Mechanism
special_effect.description: When Gatling Gun or Flamethrower is available to use in an attack, they are automatically fired during Melee Battle.

name: Small High Magnification Telescope
description: A telescope that can see far despite it being small. But its field of vision is narrow due to the size.

special_effect.name: Long Range Cannon Fire
special_effect.description: Cannon power and Hit Probability to enemy ships that are far will improve, but these effects become weaker when the enemy ships are closer.

name: Small Sterncastle Reinforcing Iron
description: Small iron to repair the sterncastle. Its strength is slightly weaker than regular iron, but is easier to repair with.

special_effect.name: Heavy Iron Sterncastle
special_effect.description: Reduce damage received on Stern, but this effect will be disabled and the repair effect will be reduced until the Durability of the Ship is fully recovered.

name: Senior Aides' Guide (Exp.Shell Def.)
description: A full guide to the mindset needed to become an Aide, including information on ship damage caused by Explosive Shells.

special_effect.name: Aide Sup.(Exp.Shell Def)
special_effect.description: Increases the effects of the following Aide Skills: Armor-piercing Explosive Def. and Fracturing Explosive Def.
